# Free `tasty t-shirts`!  Do you want to join the crew?

You are probably on this page because yof the Instagram page [tastypie_rpkg](https://www.instagram.com/tastypie_rpkg/).  
If this is not the case, go look at it, and maybe follow it.

## The `tasty t-shirts`


The `tasty t-shirts` are available in black, blue and grey.
Some people with no taste might say that they are simply a plain T-shirt with the `tastypie` logo, but the real experts know that this is the latest fashion trend and would do anything to get one.

## How to get one **for free**

There are two easy ways to get a fashionable `tasty t-shirt` **for free**:

- First way:  
  + send me your address by email;
  + send me a symbolic payment of â‚¬5 (+ shipping);
  + receive at home the tasty t-shirt in the colour and size of your choice;
  + take a photo of yourself wearing the t-shirt and send it to me;
  + I upload the photo on [tastypie_rpkg](https://www.instagram.com/tastypie_rpkg/);
  + when it reaches 50 likes, I refund you the cost of the t-shirt.

- Second way:  
  + write to me saying you are interested in the shirt;
  + send me a picture of you wearing a basic t-shirt of any kind;
  + I upload on [tastypie_rpkg](https://www.instagram.com/tastypie_rpkg/) the photo with the logo photoshopped on your t-shirt;
  + when it reaches 50 likes, send me your address and I'll send to you the shirt for free (you only have to pay the shipping costs).

So if you are interested, contact me [here](https://paolodalena.netlify.app/#contact).
